sys

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • sys.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Fundamental physical constants, unit conversion, and built-in constants.

    The physical constants are taken from CODATA 2010 (http://physics.nist.gov/cuu/Constants/index.html).

    Since:
    Sindo 3.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

      • vlight_in_au

        public static double vlight_in_au
        Speed of light in atomic unit (1.3703599918E+02 au). This is equal to the inverse of the fine structure constant.

      • remoteShell

        public static java.lang.String remoteShell
        The remote shell used for RunProcess (rsh/ssh/null). If null, the remote shell is disabled and the process is invoked at a local host.

      • qchemType

        public static java.lang.String[] qchemType
        Supported type of quantum chemistry program. All letters must be in upper case.
